original_text: They fastened the two gold chains to the rings at the corners of the breastpiece,
korean_text: 그 땋은 두 금 사슬을 흉패 끝 두 고리에 꿰매었으며

sentences.original_text: They fastened the two gold chains
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 두 개의 금 사슬을 고정했다

sentences.original_text: to the rings at the corners
